SELECT count(*) as "orderNum",sum(MASTER.order_amount) as "amount", (SELECT sum(detail.product_quantity) FROM order_detail detail JOIN order_master master on detail.order_id = MASTER.order_id WHERE MASTER.order_status = 1 and MASTER.create_time between #{star} and #{end} ) as "detailNum"
FROM order_master MASTER WHERE MASTER.order_status = 1 and MASTER.seller_id = #{sellerId} and MASTER.create_time between #{star} and #{end}

SELECT detail.product_name as "productName",sum(detail.product_quantity) as "productQuantity" FROM order_detail detail JOIN order_master master on detail.order_id = MASTER.order_id WHERE MASTER.order_status = 1 and MASTER.seller_id = #{sellerId} and MASTER.create_time between #{star} and #{end} GROUP BY detail.product_name ORDER BY sum(detail.product_quantity) desc
SELECT order_id as "id",order_amount as "amount" FROM order_master WHERE order_status = 1 and seller_id = #{sellerId} and create_time between #{star} and #{end} ORDER BY order_amount desc LIMIT 1

SELECT sum((case when HOUR(create_time) BETWEEN 0 and 6 then 1 else 0 end)) as "oneToSix", sum((case when HOUR(create_time) BETWEEN 7 and 10 then 1 else 0 end)) as "sevenToTen", sum((case when HOUR(create_time) BETWEEN 11 and 14 then 1 else 0 end)) as "elevenToFourteen", sum((case when HOUR(create_time) BETWEEN 15 and 18 then 1 else 0 end)) as "fifteenToEighteen", sum((case when HOUR(create_time) BETWEEN 19 and 22 then 1 else 0 end)) as "nineteenToTwentytwo", sum((case when HOUR(create_time) BETWEEN 23 and 24 then 1 else 0 end)) as "twentythreeToTwentyfour" FROM order_master WHERE order_status = 1 and seller_id = #{sellerId} and create_time between #{star} and #{end}

SELECT sum((case when create_time BETWEEN date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 1 day) and now() then 1 else 0 end)) as "one" ,sum((case when create_time BETWEEN date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 2 day) and date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 1 day) then 1 else 0 end)) as "two" ,sum((case when create_time BETWEEN date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 3 day) and date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 2 day) then 1 else 0 end)) as "three" ,sum((case when create_time BETWEEN date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 4 day) and date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 3 day) then 1 else 0 end)) as "four" ,sum((case when create_time BETWEEN date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 5 day) and date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 4 day) then 1 else 0 end)) as "five" ,sum((case when create_time BETWEEN date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 6 day) and date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 5 day) then 1 else 0 end)) as "six" ,sum((case when create_time BETWEEN date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 7 day) and date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 6 day) then 1 else 0 end)) as "seven" FROM order_master WHERE order_status = 1 and seller_id = #{sellerId}
